actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for the establishment of toll-free telephone communications through which residents of rural areas can obtain information on the availability in such areas of health services.
short_title: Access to Rural Health Information Act

summary.text: Access to Rural Health Information Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to award grants to the States to establish and operate toll-free telephone hot-line communications to provide health services information to individuals in rural areas. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Access to Rural Health Information Act

To amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for the establishment of toll-free telephone communications through which residents of rural areas can obtain information on the availability in such areas of health services.
